Freetime Maker Repository

This is the Official Repository of Freetime Maker

Currently it serves 6 apps. To add it to your F-Droid app, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this link:

https://freetimemaker.github.io/Repo/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
0F 75 B8 DB 80 72 74 7D CC A7 0B 30 48 2D D0 04 39 3A C7 38 24 66 A6 37 D8 25 69 83 D0 B8 5F 07
